entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User facing messages/warnings/errors should be localized, and documented #79173
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock with ClientWebsocket and lock blocks/Lazy objects #79171
  • JIT.Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615 fails #79170
    8.0.0
  • nativeAOT whether to support winform or wpf programs? #79166
  • Developers should not encounter property visibility issues when using STJ source generation #79161
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1054 code fixer should not generate a code that try to access to LibraryImport.ThrowOnUnmappableChar #79159
  • Unhandled exception on Linux ignores Dispose #79155
  • .NET runtime (on Linux) crashes with SIGABRT when using OpenSSL 3 with deprecated APIs disabled #79153
  • [.NET 7.0 + WASM AOT] App crash after update #79152
    7.0.x
  • Extra call in AppContext.BaseDirectory #79150
  • [API Proposal]: Add TotalPhysicalMemory and TotalVirtualMemory properties to the Environment class #79146
  • Is it expected that the host.native subset fails on a fresh build (when the single file host isn't yet built)? #79144
  • [AndroidCrypto] Any TargetHost input is set as SNI hostname #79143
  • Base constructor not executed in Reflection.Emit #79142
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Serialization\\Serialize\\Serialize.cmd #79132
    8.0.0
  • Inliner: don't inline callees with pinvokes inside EH #79125
    Future

Closed

  • Redundant length check when using Span<byte> => new byte[] #12571
    8.0.0
  • Vector128.Min<int> produces sub-optimal code on x64 #75892
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly.Sdk - Unsuppressable warnings #78690
    8.0.0
  • Testing System.DateTime area label #79167
  • [API Proposal]: Make FormattedLogValues class public #79149
  • Inconsistent ISO 8601 parsing between `DateTime` and `DateTimeOffset` #79131
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_CurrentUserOnly_Windows.Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_BehavesAsExpected test failure #79052
    8.0.0
  • Null ignoring at SelectElements from System.Text.Json at JsonDocumentPathExtensions #78963
  • CS8631 in System.Text.Json source generated code #78903
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize does not correctly serialize classes that inherit from List<T> #79106
  • System.Text.Json constructor deserializing with covariant return type read-only properties sets values to null #56999
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 9/27/2022 4:04:11 PM #78805
  • Query: How does using System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonDerivedType attribute prevent any possibility of remote code execution? #79154
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #79130
  • Different code execution on Mac/Windows #79139
  • .NET 6: X509Certificate2.CreateFromPemFile does not work on linux(centos 7) #79141
  • [API Proposal]: XxHash128 #77885
    8.0.0
  • Consider expanding number formatting cache to larger values #76888
    8.0.0
  • publish use runtime quickly,publish use sele-container run cost treble time #79079

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete host test targeting old xunit packages #79177
    area-Host
  • Speeds up linker tests in NativeAOT #79176
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79175
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Map correct fmt for mov instruction #79174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up `Matrix4x4.CreateScale` #79172
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Documentation signature parser tests and fixes for NativeAOT #79168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add stobj version for no reference case #79165
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a build error on x86 with FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE turned on #79164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a NonBacktracking subsumption checking rule for XY|X??Y #79163
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [JIT] Allow new temp assignment whose dstTyp is TYP_I_IMPL and valTyp is TYP_BYREF #79162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Using a literal field with stdsfld/ldsfld should trigger a MissingFieldException #79160
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Draft] Fix spurious OOMs #79158
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update new ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw methods to include ActualValue #79157
  • Disable struct promotion for structs with SIMD12 fields #79151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Supply `-s INITIAL_MEMORY` to emcc in wasm.proj #79148
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 4 of X) #79138
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #79136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add SEC_E_CONTEXT_EXPIRED to avoid throwing InternalException #79129
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve CI triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] X64 - Allow containment of larger memory operands for `AND`, `OR`, `XOR` #79126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull and ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #79096
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #78755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix NonCryptoHashTestDriver.AssertEqualHashNumber for big endian #79135
    area-System.IO
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #79026
    area-Host
  • fixes dotnet-diagnostictests funceval failures #79123
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Wait for serverTask before asserting IsCompletedSuccessfully #79071
    area-System.IO
  • Remove staged build param #79119
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2058841 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono][interp] Fix PROFILE_INTERP option #79104
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 3 of X) #79133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix debugger tests run on CI/Windows #79124
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use the new DateTimeOffset.TotalOffsetMinutes API #79107
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Increase size of Number's small numbers cache, and make it lazy #79061
  • Simplify Task.FromResult #79091
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Fix creating incorrect options in the repro package #79095
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Memory model document. #75790
    documentation, area-Meta, needs-author-action, memory model
  • Support JsonExtensionData in src-gen fast-path #77880
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
